text: White Hunter Black Heart is a 1990 American adventure drama movie directed by Clint Eastwood and was based on the 1953 novel of the same name by Peter Viertel. It also stars Jeff Fahey, Alun Armstrong, George Dzundza, Charlotte Cornwell, Norman Lumsden, Marisa Berenson, Catherine Neilson, Edward Tudor- Pole, Timothy Spall and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 drama movies Category:1990 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies about hunters Category:Movies about elephants Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies set in Zambia Category:Movies set in Zimbabwe
title: White Hunter Black Heart
